name: FAudioMeterStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an SAudioMeter

MeterValueImage: Image to use to represent the meter value.
BackgroundImage: Image to use to represent the background.
MeterBackgroundImage: Image to use to represent the meter background.
MeterValueBackgroundImage: Image to use to draw behind the meter value.
MeterPeakImage: Image to use to represent the meter peak.
MeterSize: How thick to draw the meter
MeterPadding: How much padding to add around the meter
MeterValuePadding: How much padding to add around the meter value
PeakValueWidth: How wide to draw the peak value indicator
ValueRangeDb: The minimum and maximum value to display in dB (values are clamped in this range)
bShowScale: Whether or not to show the decibel scale alongside the meter
bScaleSide: Which side to show the scale. If vertical, true means left side, false means right side. If horizontal, true means above, false means below.
ScaleHashWidth: The width of each hash mark
ScaleHashHeight: The height of each hash mark
DecibelsPerHash: How wide to draw the decibel scale, if it's enabled
Font: Font family and size to be used when displaying the meter scale.
